Class CombinedDataTransformation

java.lang.Object
  jml.object.transformation.DataTransformation
      jml.object.transformation.CombinedDataTransformation

public class CombinedDataTransformation
extends DataTransformation

Title: CombinedDataTransformation

Description: transformation operation of a Data sample that is defined as the combination of two data transformations

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia
